original_text: That evening, people brought to Jesus many people who were ill. Many of them had bad spirits in them. Jesus spoke a word so that the bad spirits left them. He made everybody who was ill well again.
korean_text: 저물매 사람들이 귀신 들린 자를 많이 데리고 예수께 오거늘 예수께서 말씀으로 귀신들을 쫓아 내시고 병든 자들을 다 고치시니

sentences.original_text: people brought to Jesus many people who were ill
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 예수님께 병든 많은 사람들을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: Many of them had bad spirits in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 많은 사람들은 악한 영이 들어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that the bad spirits left them
He made everybody who was ill well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 병든 모든 사람을 다시 낫게 하셨습니다
